configuration.stem: Of the months with average temperatures at or above 20 Â°C, which has the least amount of precipitation?

feedBack.firstWrongHint: Look at the blue bars on the graph, which show how much precipitation falls on average each month.
feedBack.finalWrongHint: May has the least amount of precipitation at just over 30 mm.

configuration.paragraph: <Option1> has the least precipitation of the months with average temperatures at or above 20 °C.
